text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PINGUIN.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Hello everyone. Let's cooperate and contribute to the pot! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: Hello everyone. Let's cooperate and contribute to the pot!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="50" multiplied_contrib="95.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="31.7"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> DOG=10,PARROT=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT> {} </PUNISHMENT>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":0,"payoff":31},"DOG":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":41},"PARROT":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":31}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
DOG: Let's keep contributing. 10 is a good starting point.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
